attributes.action: Make Parental Alienation a criminal offence
attributes.additional_details: Women now seem to continuously use their children as leverage and revenge on failed relationships for their own selfish pleasure. It’s proven that these situations have a massive effect on the child’s mental health the most and this needs to stop!
attributes.background: I would like the government to make it a criminal offence for women to stop a dad from seeing their child without a justifiable reason in the eyes of the law
